attributes.action: Close the Channel Tunnel which is an unprofitable security risk - the corporation that operates it NEVER made a profit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not only it never made a profit, but also ES trains coming to London are used by illegal immigrants as their means of transport. Please close this tunnel for these two reasons. Hardly anyone uses it, because train tickets are so expensive that hardly anyone is able to afford them. Travel time is no better than by plane. There is no reason to keep the Chunnel open. Please close it.
